text: The producers of BBC drama Ordeal by Innocence have explained the decision to recast and reshoot the Agatha Christie adaptation following sexual assault allegations made against original actor Ed Westwick. Advertisement Ordeal by Innocence was dropped from the BBC Christmas schedules after allegations of sexual assault were made against actor Westwick in November last year. Westwick strenuously denies the allegations. Producers Mammoth Screen decided to reshoot parts of the series with another actor, 30 - year - old English star Christian Cooke.
